presentation:
Burgundian by birth, adoption Lyonnais, high school diploma in pockets I went to Polytech Lyon to start my studies to become a computer science engineer.

Fascinated by new technologies, I have learned during my internships or personal experiences in many areas.

I present here the projects I was able to work alone or in teams for several years.This site lists many of the IT skills acquired Polytech but some have not been presented here.

I present here also my schooling since high school and my associative activity Polyenco.

If you want to contact me form is at your lowest available.

I am currently in the fifth and final year of my studies and looking for an internship of a minimum of 5 months beginning March 2016.
name: Antoine Caron
status: Student in Computer Science in Polytech Lyon - France

parriat.title: High School Diploma in "Lyçée Henri Parriat"

polytech.title: Diploma of computer engineer at Polyetch Lyon (being validated)
polytech.content:
Getting out of high school, I was able to integrate the integrated preparatory program of the University Polytechnic of Lyon. I stayed for two years, during which I followed a theoretical training based on mathematics and computer science curriculum of License Maths-Info from the Claude Bernard University in Lyon.

In 2013, I was able to access the engineering program at my school, in computer science specialty. The school Polytech Lyon is in the movement of the Polytech network schools, which currently has 13 schools throughout France. The school Polytech Lyon officially joined the network in 2013.

My shcool offers courses on topics:

  • Networks
  • DataBases, BI, Big Data
  • Web/Mobile Technologies
  • Embebedded sofware
  • Modeling and problem solving by computer
  • Distributed computing
  • AI

At Polytech I have the chance to make 3 internships:

  • An internship of one month between the theoretical training and engineering cycle.
  • A minimum of 5 months internship in the fourth year.
  • A terminal 5 month minimum internship during my fifth year.

Polytech Network Computer science

eolane.title: Internship at Éolane (Montceau-les-mines)
eolane.content:
I did an internship for a period of one month in the company éolane in Montceau-les-Mines in 2013 in order to access the engineer of my school cycle.

I have build an application in Visual Basic 6.0 for driving automated testbench of a cardiac defibrillator. I also work on the Bluetooth technology to encode the defibrillator.

July 2013

Visual Basic 6.0 1 month

atos.title: Internship at Worldline (Lyon)
atos.content:
During my fourth year, I was able to do an internship in the Lyon Worldline company. I've joined a team of web developers and mobile working for a big name in the global fast food.

I was able to take part in a major project on innovative technologies that I did not previously mastered.

I worked on:

  • S.E.O
  • Barcodes generation
  • Shorten Url

August 2014 - January 2015

polyenco.title: Responsible for commercial business in Polyenco
polyenco.content:
I joined the Polyenco Association in September 2013. I joined the division in charge of business where I followed a project manager training and sales / prospecting training.

Polyenco is a junior - industry , ie , a company that relies on a student association nonprofit . The members have the task of bringing students to their schools with businesses. This reconciliation is through paid contracts, conducted by members. Thus, a company can delegate one of its projects to us in order to be realized by one of our students in the limits of knowledges seen in our school.

As a sales representative I'm able to:

  • make a quote/encryption.
  • monitor and conduct projects during its realization.
  • manage customer relation.
  • organize and participate in the search for new customers.

In September 2015, I was able to be in charge of business division in Polyenco.

2013-2015

cuttingstock.name: 2 Dimensions cutting stock problem : Optimisation d'impression
cuttingstock.description:
Résolution du 2D cuttingstock problem en Java dans le cadre du cours d'Optimisation discrète.

En binôme, nous avons proposé une résolution de ce problème en applicquant l'algorithme de recuit simulé. Nous avons également utilisé des technologies assez recéntes comme les parralleleStream de Java 8 afin de réduire la complexité en temps de notre programme.

Pour ce projet nous avons également utilisé l'outils Travis qui nous a suivi tout au long du projet.

Le but de ce projet était d'optimiser les coups d'impression d'un commande pour un imprimeur. L'imprimeur devaient définir un ensemble de canevas appelés patterns sur lesquels il disposait ses images. Il doit ensuite définir le nombre d'impression de chacun de ces pattern afin de remplir au minimum la commande pour chacune des images.

Il y avait donc un travail d'optimisation sur:

  • le placement des images sur le pattern.
  • la résolution d'équation par Simplex.
  • l'optimisation de la solution par l'utilisation de meta-heuristiques (Recuit-simulé, Algorithme génétique, Méthode Tabou,..).
cuttingstock.labels: Java 8 Maven Travis-ci En binôme

filtration.name: Étude pour Polyenco et Filtration SASU
filtration.description:
Réalisation d'une application web en PHP pour un client de Polyenco.

Pour ce client j'ai du modéliser la base de donnée des produits et leur inter-compatibilitées. J'ai ensuite pu construire l'application afin que les utilisateurs puissent rechercher un filtre industriel en fonction des contraintes de leur environnement.

Ce site utilise le Framework MVC vu en cours de sciences de l'information de Mr Pesquet.
filtration.labels: PHP MySQL Polyenco
